016package io.micronaut.maven.services;
017
018import io.micronaut.core.util.StringUtils;
019import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.MavenDependency;
020import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
021import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
022import org.eclipse.aether.RepositorySystem;
023import org.eclipse.aether.RepositorySystemSession;
024import org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact;
025import org.eclipse.aether.artifact.DefaultArtifact;
026import org.eclipse.aether.collection.CollectRequest;
027import org.eclipse.aether.graph.Dependency;
028import org.eclipse.aether.graph.DependencyFilter;
029import org.eclipse.aether.resolution.ArtifactResult;
030import org.eclipse.aether.resolution.DependencyRequest;
031import org.eclipse.aether.resolution.DependencyResolutionException;
032import org.eclipse.aether.resolution.DependencyResult;
033import org.eclipse.aether.util.artifact.JavaScopes;
034import org.eclipse.aether.util.filter.DependencyFilterUtils;
035
036import javax.inject.Inject;
037import javax.inject.Singleton;
038import java.io.File;
039import java.util.ArrayList;
040import java.util.HashMap;
041import java.util.List;
042import java.util.Map;
043import java.util.stream.Stream;
044
045/**
046 * Utility methods for performing dependency resolution.
047 */
048@Singleton
049public class DependencyResolutionService {
050
051    public static final String TEST_RESOURCES_GROUP = "io.micronaut.testresources";
052    public static final String TEST_RESOURCES_ARTIFACT_ID_PREFIX = "micronaut-test-resources-";
053
054    private static final String JAR_EXTENSION = "jar";
055
056    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
057
058    private final MavenProject mavenProject;
059
060    private final RepositorySystem repositorySystem;
061
062    @Inject
063    public DependencyResolutionService(MavenSession mavenSession, MavenProject mavenProject, RepositorySystem repositorySystem) {
064        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
065        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
066        this.repositorySystem = repositorySystem;
067    }
068
069    private static Stream<File> streamClasspath(List<ArtifactResult> resolutionResult) {
070        return resolutionResult
071                .stream()
072                .map(ArtifactResult::getArtifact)
073                .map(Artifact::getFile);
074    }
075
076    public static List<String> toClasspath(List<ArtifactResult> resolutionResult) {
077        return streamClasspath(resolutionResult)
078                .map(File::getAbsolutePath)
079                .toList();
080    }
081
082    public static List<File> toClasspathFiles(List<ArtifactResult> resolutionResult) {
083        return streamClasspath(resolutionResult)
084                .toList();
085    }
086
087    public static Dependency mavenDependencyToAetherDependency(org.apache.maven.model.Dependency d) {
088        Artifact artifact = mavenDependencyToAetherArtifact(d);
089        return new Dependency(artifact, d.getScope(), Boolean.valueOf(d.getOptional()));
090    }
091
092    public static Artifact mavenDependencyToAetherArtifact(org.apache.maven.model.Dependency d) {
093        return new DefaultArtifact(d.getGroupId(), d.getArtifactId(), d.getClassifier(), d.getType(), d.getVersion());
094    }
095
096    public static MavenDependency mavenDependencyToTestResourcesDependency(org.apache.maven.model.Dependency d) {
097        return new MavenDependency(d.getGroupId(), d.getArtifactId(), d.getVersion());
098    }
099
100    public static Artifact testResourcesDependencyToAetherArtifact(MavenDependency d) {
101        return new DefaultArtifact(d.getGroup(), d.getArtifact(), JAR_EXTENSION, d.getVersion());
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Performs a dependency request to compute the transitive dependencies of the given artifacts.
106     *
107     * @param artifacts The artifacts to resolve
108     * @param applyManagedDependencies Whether to apply the managed dependencies of the project
109     * @return The resolution result
110     */
111    public List<ArtifactResult> artifactResultsFor(Stream<Artifact> artifacts, boolean applyManagedDependencies) throws DependencyResolutionException {
112        RepositorySystemSession repositorySession = mavenSession.getRepositorySession();
113        DependencyFilter classpathFilter = DependencyFilterUtils.classpathFilter(JavaScopes.RUNTIME);
114        CollectRequest collectRequest = new CollectRequest();
115        collectRequest.setRepositories(mavenProject.getRemoteProjectRepositories());
116
117        if (applyManagedDependencies) {
118            List<org.apache.maven.model.Dependency> dependencies = mavenProject.getDependencyManagement().getDependencies();
119            Map<String, Dependency> dependencyMap = new HashMap<>(dependencies.size());
120            for (org.apache.maven.model.Dependency dependency : dependencies) {
121                String ga = dependency.getGroupId() + ":" + dependency.getArtifactId();
122                dependencyMap.putIfAbsent(ga, DependencyResolutionService.mavenDependencyToAetherDependency(dependency));
123            }
124            collectRequest.setManagedDependencies(new ArrayList<>(dependencyMap.values()));
125
126            artifacts.forEach(a -> {
127                if (StringUtils.isEmpty(a.getVersion())) {
128                    dependencyMap.computeIfPresent(a.getGroupId() + ":" + a.getArtifactId(), (coord, d) -> {
129                        collectRequest.addDependency(new Dependency(new DefaultArtifact(a.getGroupId(), a.getArtifactId(), a.getExtension(), d.getArtifact().getVersion()), JavaScopes.RUNTIME));
130                        return d;
131                    });
132                } else {
133                    collectRequest.addDependency(new Dependency(a, JavaScopes.RUNTIME));
134                }
135            });
136        } else {
137            artifacts.map(a -> new Dependency(a, JavaScopes.RUNTIME)).forEach(collectRequest::addDependency);
138        }
139
140        DependencyRequest dependencyRequest = new DependencyRequest(collectRequest, classpathFilter);
141
142        DependencyResult dependencyResult = repositorySystem.resolveDependencies(repositorySession, dependencyRequest);
143        return dependencyResult.getArtifactResults();
144    }
145}
